attributes.action: recognise that speed in itself is NOT the primary cause of accidents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is NOT speed that causes accidents. It is bad driving eg not looking for other traffic, ignoring Stop signs, ignoring give way signs on the entrances to motorways.

rejection.details: There are several existing petitions around this theme. Please consider signing one of those before opening a new petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
